message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
That's a little high for me. I'm only willing to pay $80 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate you being willing to come down a bit, but $110 is still a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  How about $95?
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll sell it to you for $105.
I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $90, but that's my absolute limit.  Let me know if you're willing to work with me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $90, but I'm still not willing to sell it for that price. I'll sell it to you for $115, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
